remarks: Quotient and remainder of a nonnegative integer divided by a positive integer.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-2008.)
statement:
quorem.1 $e |- Q = ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) $.
quorem.2 $e |- R = ( A - ( B x. Q ) ) $.
quoremnn0 $p |- ( ( A e. NN0 /\ B e. NN ) -> ( ( Q e. NN0 /\ R e. NN0 ) /\ ( R < B /\ A = ( ( B x. Q ) + R ) ) ) ) $.
